items.title: Investment bank Lazard to get a boost from improving dealmaking outlook, KBW says
items.description: The firm upgraded Lazard stock to an outperform rating from market perform.

items.description: Bank of America believes that shares of American Eagle could fall an additional 22% from here.

items.title: Nvidia gets a price target increase from Stifel ahead of earnings this week
items.description: The firm maintained its overweight rating on the stock, while raising its price target.
